content: I completely agree with your viewpoint. researchers should share their findings with the musicians themselves and seek feedback from them. the musicians are the experts in their own cultural traditions, and their feedback is crucial in creating a nuanced understanding of the music's cultural significance. by involving musicians in the feedback and review process, researchers can ensure that their findings are accurate, respectful, and sensitive to the cultural context. their feedback can also augment and complement the research, enhancing its authenticity and accuracy. therefore, a collaborative relationship between researchers and musicians would ensure that research findings are informed, accurate, and respectful of cultural heritage.
